text.section:
The Board consists of the following three members:
the Secretary of Public Safety and Correctional Services, or the Secretary's representative;
the Secretary of Budget and Management, or the Secretary's representative; and
the Comptroller, or the Comptroller's representative.
The Governor shall designate one member of the Board as chairperson and another member as secretary of the Board.
The chairperson may call a meeting of the Board.
Each member of the Board is entitled to reimbursement of expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
